description: The country is close to being overwhelmed as the number of cases soars, the health minister warns.
title: Coronavirus: Belgium facing 'tsunami' of new infections
title_page: Coronavirus: Belgium facing 'tsunami' of new infections - BBC News
maintext: From Monday, under new government restrictions designed to tackle the fresh outbreak, residents will only be allowed to see one other person from outside their household and should work from home if possible.
